structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: The president of each postsecondary education institution shall make to his governing board written reports which shall contain a full account of receipts of money from all sources, amount, and purpose of disbursements thereof, and the condition of the university or college. The reports shall be made according to a schedule established by the board.
law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 108, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4527-53.
